fields.name: Nutrients
fields.description: Nitrogen and phosphorus compounds essential for aquatic life and indicators of eutrophication

fields.name: Heavy Metals
fields.description: Trace metals and heavy metals that can be toxic at elevated concentrations

fields.name: Microbiological
fields.description: Bacterial and viral indicators of water quality and potential health risks

fields.name: Organic Contaminants
fields.description: Organic pollutants including pesticides, pharmaceuticals, and industrial chemicals

fields.name: Major Ions
fields.description: Principal dissolved ions determining water chemistry and salinity

fields.name: Field Parameters
fields.description: Parameters measured directly in the field using portable instruments
